DOC.brief_summary: The study will demonstrate the effect of 24 weeks of treatment with vildagliptin compared to placebo on insulin sensitivity in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) treated with metformin, assessed as glucose Rd (rate of glucose disposal) during a hyperinsulinemic euglycemic clamp.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Effect of 24 Weeks of Treatment With Vildagliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: 1. Age in the range of 1870 years. 2. Patients with T2DM, diagnosed at least 6 months prior to Visit 1, who have received metformin for at least 3 months and have been on a stable dose of at least 1000mg daily for a minimum of 4 weeks prior to Visit 1. 3.
